name: After the Fire
description:
After the fires at Fazbear's Fright, they build a small facility and put Springtrap back in it, leaving you to guard him. Now it's up to you to survive the nightshift.

FNaF is owned by Scott Cawthon and so is the music!!

Voice Credits:
Phone Guy - Logan Black (me)
Springtrap - PJ Heywood

Burned Springtrap Design by Fazboggle
